preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This guide explains the various options for hosting your OTHERobjects powered site and making it highly available. It assumes a good level of system administartion experience.
The standard installation will be fine for small and medium sized sites but large or transaction sites will need more advanced hosting options descripbed in this guide.
